## Baseline Comparisons

```{r}
spatial <- readRDS('data/in/DRB_spatial/network.rds')
edges <- spatial$edges %>% st_as_sf()

metrics <- c('overall_metrics','month_metrics','reach_metrics')

gwn_stats <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('data/out/baseline',.))
names(gwn_stats) <- c('temps','months','segs')

rgcn_stats <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('../river-dl/data/out/baseline',.))
names(rgcn_stats) <- c('temps','months','segs')

## Figure for overall difference between the two models

p1 <- gwn_stats$segs %>% mutate(run = 'GraphWaveNet') %>% bind_rows(rgcn_stats$segs %>% mutate(run = 'RGCN')) %>%
  seg_plotter_sf(., 'nse_mean') +
  facet_wrap(~run)
p1

baseline_diff <- seg_error_diff(rgcn_stats$segs, gwn_stats$segs, 'RGCN', 'GraphWaveNet')

p2 <- baseline_diff %>% filter(metric == 'rmse_mean') %>% seg_plotter_sf(., 'metric_diff') +
  scale_color_gradient2(na.value = 'white', mid = 'grey90', name = 'RMSE\nDifference', limits=c(-1,1)) +
  labs(title = 'RGCN minus GWN') +
  theme(title = element_text(size =8))
p2

bias_gwn <- add_bias('data/out/baseline')
bias_rgcn <- add_bias('../river-dl/data/out')


p3 <- bias_rgcn$months %>% filter(partition == 'test') %>% mutate(model= 'RGCN') %>%
  bind_rows(bias_gwn$months %>% filter(partition == 'test') %>% mutate(model = 'GraphWaveNet')) %>%
  pivot_longer(c(rmse_mean, bias_mean)) %>%
  mutate(name = factor(name, levels = c('rmse_mean', 'bias_mean'))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=month, y=value, fill=model, shape = name)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(end =.6) +
  #scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0,1,2)) +
  geom_col(position = 'dodge') +
  facet_wrap(~name,nrow=2, scales='free_y') +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = 'Month', y = 'Â°Celsius')


layout <- rbind(c(1,1,2),
                c(1,1,2),
                c(1,1,2),
                c(3,3,3),
                c(3,3,3))

g <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(p1,p2,p3, layout_matrix = layout)

#ggsave('figures/baseline_comps.png',plot = g, width = 5, height = 4.5, units = 'in')

rgcn_stats$temps %>% mutate(model = 'RGCN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_stats$temps %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  select(group, rmse_mean, model) %>%
  filter(group != 'Normal Temp') %>%
  mutate(rmse_mean = round(rmse_mean, 2)) %>%
  rename(`Temp. Bin` = group) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = model, values_from = rmse_mean) %>%
  relocate(RGCN, .after = GWN) %>%
  kableExtra::kbl(caption = 'Overall RMSE by Temperature Bin') %>%
  kableExtra::kable_material(full_width = F)


p1 <- rgcn_stats$temps %>%
  mutate(model = 'RGCN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_stats$temps %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = group, y = nse_mean, color = model)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = nse_mean - nse_sd, ymax = nse_mean +nse_sd)) +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle('NSE')

p2 <- rgcn_stats$temps %>%
  mutate(model = 'RGCN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_stats$temps %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = group, y = rmse_mean, color = model)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = rmse_mean - rmse_sd, ymax = rmse_mean + rmse_sd)) +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle('RMSE')

gridExtra::grid.arrange(p1,p2, ncol = 1)
```

### LTO Comps

```{r}
metrics <- c('overall_metrics','month_metrics','reach_metrics')

gwn_lto_min <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('data/out/LTO/min',.))
names(gwn_lto_min) <- c('temps','months','segs')

gwn_lto_max <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('data/out/LTO/max', .))
names(gwn_lto_max) <- c('temps','months','segs')


rgcn_lto_min <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('../river-dl/data/out/LTO/min',.))
names(rgcn_lto_min) <- c('temps','months','segs')

rgcn_lto_max <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('../river-dl/data/out/LTO/max',.))
names(rgcn_lto_max) <- c('temps','months','segs')

rgcn_diff_min <- seg_error_diff(rgcn_stats$segs, rgcn_lto_min$segs, 'Baseline', 'Holdout')
rgcn_diff_max <- seg_error_diff(rgcn_stats$segs, rgcn_lto_max$segs, 'Baseline', 'Holdout')

gwn_diff_min <- seg_error_diff(gwn_stats$segs, gwn_lto_max$segs, 'Baseline', 'Holdout')
gwn_diff_max <- seg_error_diff(gwn_stats$segs, gwn_lto_max$segs, 'Baseline', 'Holdout')

full <- rgcn_diff_max %>% mutate(model = 'RGCN', holdout = 'Max Temps') %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_diff_min%>% mutate(model = 'RGCN', holdout = 'Min Temps')) %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_diff_max  %>% mutate(model = 'GWN', holdout = 'Max Temps')) %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_diff_min  %>% mutate(model = 'GWN', holdout = 'Min Temps'))

sig_test <- full %>%
  group_by(holdout, model, metric) %>%
  nest() %>%
  mutate(wilcox = map(data, ~wilcox.test(.$Baseline, .$Holdout) %>% broom::tidy())) %>%
  select(-data) %>%
  unnest(cols = c(wilcox)) %>%
  mutate(p.value = round(p.value,3))

full %>% 
  filter(metric == 'nse_mean') %>%
  #select(seg_id_nat, rmse_diff) %>%
  mutate(metric_diff = ifelse(metric_diff > 1, 1, ifelse(metric_diff < -1, -1, metric_diff))) %>%
  seg_plotter_sf(., 'metric_diff') +
  scale_color_gradient2(na.value = 'white', mid = 'grey80', name = 'RMSE\nDifference', breaks = c(-1,-.5,0,.5,1),labels = c('<-1', '-.5', "0", '.5', '>1')) +
  facet_grid(holdout~model) 
  #ggtitle('Baseline Minus Temperature Holdut Runs')

ggsave('figures/lto_spatial.png', width = 4, height = 5, units = 'in')

lto_full_segs <- gwn_lto_min$segs %>% mutate(run = 'TrainHot_TestCold', model='GWN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_lto_max$segs %>% mutate(run = 'TrainCold_TestHot', model='GWN')) %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_lto_max$segs %>% mutate(run = 'TrainCold_TestHot', model = 'RGCN')) %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_lto_min$segs %>% mutate(run = 'TrainHot_TestCold', model = 'RGCN')) %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_stats$segs %>% mutate(run = 'Baseline') %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_stats$segs %>% mutate(run = 'Baseline', model = 'RGCN')) %>%
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  pivot_longer(c(contains('sd'),contains('mean')),
               names_to=c('metric','type'),
               names_sep = '_') %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from='type', values_from = 'value')

meds <- lto_full_segs %>% 
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  group_by(model, run, metric) %>%
  summarise(median = median(value, na.rm = T))

ggplot(lto_full_segs %>% filter(metric=='rmse'), aes(x=mean, y = run, fill = model)) +
  stat_density_ridges(alpha = .3, scale = 1, quantile_lines = T,quantiles = 0.5) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(end = .6) + 
  scale_color_viridis_d(end = .6) +
  #scale_y_discrete(labels = c('Baseline', 'Train Cold/\nTest Hot', 'Train Hot/\nTest Cold')) +
  xlim(0,5) +
  theme_classic() +
  ggtitle('Comparison of Reach Scale RMSE') +
  facet_wrap(~metric, scales = 'free')

ggplot(lto_full_segs %>% filter(partition =='test'), aes(x = value, y = run, fill = model)) + geom_density_ridges(alpha = .3, scale = .9) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(end = .6) + 
  geom_vline(data= meds %>% filter(run == 'baseline'), aes(xintercept = median, color = model)) +
  geom_point(data= meds, aes(x = median, color = model), size = 2, shape =23) +
  scale_color_viridis_d(end = .6) + 
  scale_y_discrete(labels = c('Baseline', 'Train Cold/\nTest Hot', 'Train Hot/\nTest Cold')) +
  #xlim(0,7) +
  theme_classic() +
  ggtitle('Comparison of Reach Scale RMSE') +
  facet_wrap(~metric, scales = 'free')

ggsave('figures/lto_ridges.png', width = 4.5, height = 3, units = 'in')  

ggplot(lto_full_segs %>% filter(metric =='nse_mean'), aes(x = value, y = run, fill = model)) + geom_density_ridges(alpha = .3, scale = .9) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(end = .6) + 
  geom_vline(data= meds %>% filter(run == 'baseline'), aes(xintercept = median, color = model)) +
  geom_point(data= meds, aes(x = median, color = model), size = 2, shape =23) +
  scale_color_viridis_d(end = .6) + 
  scale_y_discrete(labels = c('Baseline', 'Train Cold/\nTest Hot', 'Train Hot/\nTest Cold')) +
  xlim(0,1) +
  theme_classic() +
  ggtitle('Comparison of Reach Scale RMSE') +
  facet_wrap(~metric, scales = 'free')

lto_full_temps <- gwn_lto_min$temps %>% mutate(run = 'TrainHot_TestCold', model='GWN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_lto_max$temps %>% mutate(run = 'TrainCold_TestHot', model='GWN')) %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_lto_max$temps %>% mutate(run = 'TrainCold_TestHot', model = 'RGCN')) %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_lto_min$temps %>% mutate(run = 'TrainHot_TestCold', model = 'RGCN')) %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_stats$temps %>% mutate(run = 'Baseline') %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_stats$temps %>% mutate(run = 'Baseline', model = 'RGCN')) %>%
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  pivot_longer(c(contains('sd'),contains('mean')),
               names_to=c('metric','type'),
               names_sep = '_') %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from='type', values_from = 'value')
  #pivot_longer(c('nse','rmse','piw','picp'), names_to = 'metric')

ggplot(lto_full_temps, aes(x=mean, y = group, color = run)) +
  geom_point(position=position_dodge(width=.2)) +
  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin = mean-sd,xmax = mean+sd),
                 linetype = "dotted",
                 position=position_dodge(width=0.2)) +
  facet_grid(model~metric, scales = 'free')
        
lto_full_temps %>% #select(temp_group, run, rmse, model) %>%
  filter(group != 'Normal Temp', partition == 'test') %>%
  mutate(value = round(value, 2)) %>%
  rename(`Temp. Bin` = group) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = run, values_from = value) %>%
  mutate(`Max Dif` = baseline-max,
         `Min Dif` = baseline-min) %>%
  select(`Temp. Bin`, `Train Cold/Test Hot` = `Max Dif`, `Train Hot/Test Cold` = `Min Dif`, metric, model) %>%
  arrange(`Temp. Bin`,metric) %>%
  kableExtra::kbl(caption = 'Overall Change in RMSE from Baseline by Temperature Bin') %>%
  kableExtra::kable_material(full_width = F)

```


### LLO Comps

```{r}
llo_groups <- read_csv('data/in/DRB_spatial/llo_groups.csv')

rgcn_llo <- metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('../river-dl/data/out/LLO',., subfolders = T))
names(rgcn_llo) <- c('temps','months','segs')

gwn_llo <-  metrics %>% map(~combine_replicates('data/out/LLO_ensemble',., subfolders = T))
names(gwn_llo) <- c('temps','months','segs')

p1 <- rgcn_llo$segs %>% mutate(model = 'RGCN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_llo$segs %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  seg_plotter_sf(., 'nse_mean') +
  facet_wrap(~model, nrow =1)

rgcn_diff <- seg_error_diff(rgcn_stats$segs, rgcn_llo$segs %>%select(-run), 'Baseline', 'Holdout')

gwn_diff <- seg_error_diff(gwn_stats$segs, gwn_llo$segs %>% select(-run), 'Baseline', 'Holdout')

full <- gwn_diff %>% select(seg_id_nat, partition, metric, metric_diff) %>% mutate(model = 'GWN') %>%
  bind_rows(rgcn_diff %>% select(seg_id_nat, partition, metric, metric_diff) %>% mutate(model = 'RGCN'))

p2 <-full %>% 
  mutate(metric_diff = ifelse(metric_diff > 3, 3, ifelse(metric_diff < -1, -1, metric_diff))) %>%
  filter(metric == 'nse_mean', partition == 'test') %>%
  seg_plotter_sf(., 'metric_diff') +
  #scale_color_gradient2(na.value = 'white', mid = 'grey80', name = 'RMSE\nDifference', breaks = c(-3,-1.5,0,1.5,3),labels = c('<-3', '-1.5', "0", '1.5', '>3')) +
  scale_color_gradient2(na.value = 'white', mid = 'grey80', name = 'RMSE\nDifference') +
  facet_wrap(~model) 

g <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(p1,p2, nrow =2)

ggsave('figures/llo_spatial.png',plot=g, width = 4,height = 6, units = 'in')  

rgcn_base_llo <- rgcn_stats$segs %>% mutate(test_group = case_when(seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 1]~'group_1',
                                                                   seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 2]~'group_2',
                                                                   seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 3]~'group_3'),
                                            model = 'RGCN') %>%
  select(seg_id_nat, rmse_mean, test_group, model)

gwn_base_llo <- gwn_stats$segs %>% mutate(test_group = case_when(seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 1]~'group_1',
                                                                   seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 2]~'group_2',
                                                                   seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 3]~'group_3'),
                                          model = 'GWN') %>%
  select(seg_id_nat, rmse_mean, test_group, model)

full_reshape <- rgcn_diff %>% mutate(model = 'RGCN') %>%
  bind_rows(gwn_diff %>% mutate(model = 'GWN')) %>%
  mutate(test_group = case_when(seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 1]~'Headwaters',
                                seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 2]~'Piedmont',
                                seg_id_nat %in% llo_groups$seg_id_nat[llo_groups$test_group == 3]~'Coastal'))


full_reshape %>%
  filter(partition == 'test') %>%
  group_by(model, metric) %>%
  summarise(mean_diff = round(mean(metric_diff, na.rm = T),3),
            sd_dff = round(sd(metric_diff, na.rm = T),3),
            median = round(median(metric_diff, na.rm = T),3))

sig_test <- full_reshape %>%
  filter(!is.na(metric_diff)) %>%
  select(-c(Baseline, Holdout)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = model, values_from = metric_diff) %>%
  group_by(test_group) %>%
  nest() %>%
  mutate(wilcox = map(data, ~wilcox.test(.$GWN, .$RGCN) %>% broom::tidy()))

sig_test <- full_reshape %>%
  filter(!is.na(metric_diff), partition == 'test') %>%
  #select(-c(Baseline, Holdout)) %>%
  #pivot_wider(names_from = model, values_from = metric_diff) %>%
  group_by(test_group, model, metric) %>%
  nest() %>%
  mutate(wilcox = map(data, ~wilcox.test(.$Baseline, .$Holdout) %>% broom::tidy())) %>%
  select(-data) %>%
  unnest(cols = c(wilcox)) %>%
  mutate(p.value = round(p.value,3))


full_reshape %>% filter(!is.na(metric_diff), partition == 'test') %>%
  select(-metric_diff) %>%
  pivot_longer(c(Baseline, Holdout)) %>%
  mutate(test_group = factor(test_group, levels = c('Coastal', 'Piedmont','Headwaters'))) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = value, y = test_group, fill = name)) +
    geom_density_ridges(
    quantile_lines = TRUE, quantiles = .5, scale = 0.9, alpha = 0.7,
    vline_size = 1) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(alpha = .3, end = .6) +
  facet_grid(model~metric, scales ='free') +
  #coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,8)) +
  labs(x = 'RMSE', y='Holdout Region', fill = 'Model Run') +
  theme_bw()

full_reshape %>% filter(!is.na(metric_diff), partition == 'test', metric == 'nse_mean') %>%
  select(-metric_diff) %>%
  pivot_longer(c(Baseline, Holdout)) %>%
  mutate(test_group = factor(test_group, levels = c('Coastal', 'Piedmont','Headwaters'))) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = value, y = test_group, fill = name)) +
    geom_density_ridges(
    quantile_lines = TRUE, quantiles = .5, scale = 0.9, alpha = 0.7,
    vline_size = 1) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(alpha = .3, end = .6) +
  facet_grid(model~metric, scales ='free') +
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(-1,1)) +
  labs(x = 'RMSE', y='Holdout Region', fill = 'Model Run') +
  theme_bw()

ggsave('figures/llo_dist.png',width = 5.5, height = 4, units = 'in')
```


## Make some plots that show change in segment RMSE as 

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
full_log <- llo_rmse %>% full_join(edges %>% st_set_geometry(NULL)) %>% mutate(comp = 'Leave Location Out') %>%
  bind_rows(baseline %>% full_join(edges %>% st_set_geometry(NULL)) %>% mutate(comp = 'Baseline')) 

p1 <- full_log %>%
  seg_plotter_sf(., 'rmse') + 
  facet_wrap(~comp) + 
  ggtitle('RMSE')

check <- full_log %>% 
  select(comp,seg_id_nat, rmse) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(seg_id_nat)) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from=comp, values_from = rmse) %>%
  mutate(metric_diff = Baseline-`Leave Location Out`) %>%
  left_join(full_log %>% select(run, seg_id_nat) %>% filter(run != 'baseline'))

p2 <- check %>% mutate(rmse_diff = case_when(rmse_diff > 5 ~ 5,
                                       rmse_diff < -5 ~ -5,
                                       is.numeric(rmse_diff)~rmse_diff)) %>%
  seg_plotter_sf(., 'rmse_diff') +
  scale_color_gradient2(na.value = 'white', mid = 'grey90') +
  ggtitle('RMSE Difference \n(Baseline - LLO)')

medians <- full_log %>% group_by(comp) %>%
  summarise(med = median(rmse, na.rm = T))

p3 <- ggplot(full_log, aes(x = rmse)) + 
  geom_density(fill = 'grey70') +
  geom_vline(data = medians, aes(xintercept =med), color = 'red') +
  facet_wrap(~comp, nrow = 1, scales = 'free_x') +
  theme_minimal()

p4 <- ggplot(check, aes(x = rmse_diff, fill = run)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = .7) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept =median(rmse_diff, na.rm=T)), color = 'red') +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(labels = c('Headwaters', 'Piedmont', 'Coastal'))+
  labs(fill = 'Test Group', x = 'rmse difference') +
  theme_minimal()

layout <- rbind(c(1,1,1,2,2),c(1,1,1,2,2),c(3,3,4,4,4))
gridExtra::grid.arrange(p1,p2, p3,p4, layout_matrix = layout) #nrow = 2, widths = c(.66,.33), heights = c(.66,.33))

```
